name: CodeBlue
0:
”Alexa open code blue”
”Alexa ask code blue to calculate a speeding ticket”
”Alexa tell code blue to search for Marked Lanes Violation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: code blue
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Code Blue is a Virtual Assistant designed and optimized for Law Enforcement Agents. It assists police officers in the Field, at the Station, even at Home providing a rich set of capabilities including:
- Daily Law Question and Answer to improve officer's knowledge
- Full Access to ALL Massachusetts Motor Vehicle Law and Fines
- Full Access to ALL Massachusetts Criminal Law Elements and Arrest Powers
- Real-time GPS Location to help identify your location during traffic stops
- Automated Speeding Ticket Calculator
